modName: Fast travel to Skyrim cities unlocker
summary: Reading this book will enable fast travel to all the cities in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
This mod will place a book in The sleeping giant inn in Riverwood. It's located on the left side of the bar.

Reading the book will ask the player if they want to enable fast travel map markers to:
Dawnstar
Falkreath
Markarth
Morthal
Riften
Solitude
Whiterun
Windhelm
Winterhold

So you can travel to all the cities without having to visit them first.

[b]Installation[/b]
-Install with a Mod Manager
-Unpack the zip and place the 2 files in the Skyrim data folder.

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
-Uninstall with a Mod Manager
-Remove FastTravelBook.bsa and FastTravelBook.esp from the Skyrim data folder.
author: Naaitsab
